value.title: Microsoft adds two new Indian languages to Translator service

value.title: 6 Critical – And Urgent – Ethics Issues With AI
value.excerpt: There is no doubt in most people’s minds that AI is one of the most transformative technologies of our time. There is no doubt in mine that it is the most transformative technology ever. The “of our time” position has been borne out already.
